trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Temecula
There were no other sightings in Temecula on or around July 9th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi was hading down the 79 highway going north from the taco bell and i looked in the sky over by the 15 freeway and all of the sudden two huge looking spotlights were in the air not moving then i continued to look as different color lights started going around it with the two spotlights on it was gigantic bigger then a plan you would see close in the sky. as i continued to drive down almost to pachanga parkway a cop flipped his lights on and shined his spot lights on the my side of the on comming traffic almost to divert attention it was incredible. i see things all the time but this was my major conformation on ufos truly saw an alien ship there is no other explanation it was gone in the blink of the eye
Summary: Two bright looking spot lights that started flashing.
